column4: Hi, I'm not clear on how to upgrade my firefox to 3.5.7. Could someone tell me how?
I heard it was faster
Why? Is there something wrong with the beta?
I did
Videos run like crap for me
Firefox runs them amazing for me
How do I install it?
in karmic firefox is 3.5.7 already
I'm using hjaunty
jaunty*
So run the firefox application and it'll just start up?
ah, possibly a ppa from mozilla?
After I did that, it didn't have the plugins.
when I extract it, and run firefox, it opens up and is upgraded, but the plugins aren't there
And it doesn't update my current firefox.
I mean things like flash player
Those plugins
They aren't there. Is there a specific folder I need to extract it too?
How do I go about updating firefox to its latest version while keeping my plugins?
the plugins need to be made for that version. a newer version of firefox will mean a newer version for the plugins
I'm using 64 bit ubuntu if that makes a difference
not at all.
